they escaped into the hidden passageway, they made it explode to fool
everyone, and the secret passageway is a mile away.....duh.....also,
plintissa is extremely strong, has many tentecles to carry them in and would
still have her hands free.....you can't control my characters, how about
reading their bios? are reading the posts.....plus, the underground base was
a secret.....so shut up, and play the RPG and stop moding, idiot.....i'm
having to improvise for you, and you'd better like it!......
